MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L19 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Wainwright Grove, Hughestead Grove and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.26am on 31st of Dec 2020.
